title: ONE DAY SALE: Great Old Judges for Sale or trade
author: oldjudge

posts.post_title: ONE DAY SALE: Great Old Judges for Sale or trade
posts.post_content:
This is the last bits of the iconic Cambridge Collection. This will be one of the last opportunities to get a card or cards from this great group. Please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url] if interested.
THIS SALE IS FOR THE NEXT 24 HOURS. AFTER THIS THE REMAINING CARDS WILL BE GO TO AUCTION.


Thanks--Jay
Great card with super image. Vaughn is one of the scarcities in the set. NO longer available
Fantastic card with great image. Lowe was the first player to hit four homers in a game
Beautiful card of Milwaukee catcher William Fuller. -NO LONGER AVAILABLE

A great way to get an Old Judge Connor at a reasonable price. card has a pinkish image, but is still clear. This card is not from the Cambridge Collection. It was my copy that I upgraded with the Cambridge Collection copy. The fielding pose is scarcer than the hands on knees pose--NO LONGER AVAILABLE
Corner chip keeps this card, with a beautiful image, reasonably priced
Nice left sheet margin card. --NO LONGER AVAILABLE
Vaughn is gone, but some really nice cards remain
You know you can rotate that picture on your iphone after you take it.....click 'edit' and the rotate button......great prices on the Wards.....surprised they're still there.....
Thanks Tom. My solution was to leave the card on my desk and walk ninety degrees counterclockwise around the desk before I take the picture.
That could work, but probably only in the Southern Hemisphere.......

[quote name="oldjudge" post=1277887]Thanks Tom. My solution was to leave the card on my desk and walk ninety degrees counterclockwise around the desk before I take the picture.[/QUOTE]

I am just glad you don't have dirt under your fingernails. That is gross. Nice cards and good luck with them. And I like your method for taking the pictures too. You might try a clockwise walk around them and see how that fares for you?
I only put dirt under my fingernails when I post of Farmersonly.com. BTW, if I go clockwise the card will turn up upside down.
Bump for one day sale. Ends June 4 at 8:00 PM EDT.
